snippet.title: Doodle Adventure of Chameleon Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Chameleon is a side-scrolling platformer with a hand-drawn doodle style. In this world of doodles, you will play as a chameleon created by a young boy's imagination. With the whimsical and imaginative adventures the young boy envisions, the charming chameleon embarks on thrilling adventures!"

localized.title: Doodle Adventure of Chameleon Announcement Trailer

With the whimsical and imaginative adventures the young boy envisions, the charming chameleon embarks on thrilling adventures!"
